commentBody:
Dear Gail, perhaps you could also have titled your column today-

"Oh, No! Ivanka Trump's Sending a Style Alert"

This should be a clear sign in future that Donald has met with the press or possibly a visiting head of state e.g. Shinzo Abe, with Ivanka in tow at the discussions for a bit of "product placement" afterwards. As after the GOP Convention or the post election "60 Minutes" interview, style conscious Trump supporters will be offered a "golden opportunity" to pick up a €$10,000 gold bangle or other item from her collection.

With Donald Trump showing no signs of wishing to turn his business interests over to a blind trust and every sign of wishing his progeny to be intimately involved in the presidency, who knows what lies ahead. A White House shopping channel perhaps?
